Member Enumeration Documentation

enum icomp::IPackagesManager::PackageType
Enumerator:
PT_UNKNOWN 
PT_REAL 

Real packages are stored as dynamic linked libraries in arp files.

PT_COMPOSED 

Composed packages are stored in folders containing registry files (arx files).

package path or empty string if specified package is not registered.

virtual bool icomp::IPackagesManager::LoadPackages ( const QString &  configFilePath = QString()) [pure virtual]

Configure environment for specified file path.

If this file path is invalid or empty, standard configuration file will be used.

Implemented in icmpstr::CPackagesLoaderComp, icmpstr::CRegistriesManagerComp, and icomp::CEnvironmentManagerBase.
